project1.name: Virtual Catalog
project1.p1: An entrepreneurial venture sought an elegant and functional way to showcase its product catalog online. They needed a tool that would facilitate navigation and allow direct connection with their customers.
project1.p2: Based on this need, we created a dynamic virtual catalog developed with React. We implemented smart filters by categories and subcategories, along with a clear and responsive interface that guides the user naturally.
project1.p3: The result was a modern and efficient platform designed to turn visitors into real opportunities. This solution fosters direct communication with potential clients, elevating the brand's digital experience to a new level.

project2.name: School System
project2.p1: An educational institution needed a comprehensive solution to modernize academic management. They sought to automate processes such as grade submission, report card generation, and differentiated access based on user roles to improve efficiency and internal communication.
project2.p2: Based on these requirements, we designed a custom fullstack platform using PHP and MySQL. The system allows virtual classroom management, academic report generation, and organized content delivery, all through an intuitive interface tailored to each access level.
project2.p3: The result was a robust and functional digital environment that automated nearly 80% of administrative tasks. This solution optimizes time, improves data traceability, and strengthens the connection between teachers, students, and the leadership team in a centralized space.

project3.name: ICFES Simulations
project3.p1: The Escuela Normal Superior de Ocaña was looking for a digital solution to help students prepare for the ICFES exams. They needed an accessible platform for conducting online simulations and generating useful reports for teachers and administrators.
project3.p2: From this need, we developed a robust fullstack system based on PHP and MySQL. The tool allows for personalized simulations, instant result analysis, and detailed statistics to support real-time pedagogical tracking.
project3.p3: The impact was immediate: teachers accessed precise performance data by subject and student, while learners practiced in a realistic environment. The platform strengthens academic preparation and enhances strategic educational decision-making.

project4.name: Juntos en Cada Paso Foundation
project4.p1: The Juntos en Cada Paso Foundation needed a digital platform to showcase its activities and connect with people willing to support its cause. They wanted a clear, accessible website that reflected their social commitment.
project4.p2: We designed a fullstack solution using Laravel that combines a dynamic informational site with an online donation system. We integrated a secure payment gateway to facilitate contributions, along with simple content management to keep everything up to date.
project4.p3: The result was a tool that drives the foundation’s mission: they can now share their work, receive contributions efficiently, and strengthen their digital presence. All with a smooth, reliable experience aligned with their core values.

review1.name: Alicia Castro
review1.comment: LetOne is a highly committed and skilled company. Thanks to the school web system they developed for us, we managed to automate a large part of our administrative processes and significantly reduce the workload of all our staff.

review2.name: Lemis Camargo
review2.comment: The LetOne team developed a system that exceeded my original idea. It not only allows us to conduct exams online but also generates reports with all the necessary statistics to analyze and optimize the performance of both students and teachers.

review3.name: Luiggi Parra
review3.comment: LetOne provided us with a digital catalog that welcomes potential clients and gives them all the information they need to make a purchase. Thanks to this tool, we are now capturing our clients’ attention more effectively.

review4.name: Harold Cervantes
review4.position: Juntos en Cada Paso Foundation Director
review4.comment: The platform LetOne developed for our foundation has been a complete game changer. We can now manage our donations securely and transparently, and we have seen a significant increase in support for our cause thanks to its intuitive and functional design.
